under_hope_on_wings_returns:
In difficult times, we become stronger together. Join our
 communities of support and assistance.
description_synara:
Synara - is a platform created by Ukrainians for Ukrainians.
 In these difficult times, when our country is going through trials, we
 connect those who need help with those who are ready to provide it. We
 believe in the power of human kindness and solidarity, and we know that we are together
 we can overcome any difficulties.

 Our mission - is to create a safe, comfortable and accessible space where everyone,
 who suffered from the war, will be able to find the necessary support, to restore
 hope and believe in a bright future. We strive not only to satisfy
 urgent needs of people, but also to help them find strength and resources for
 reconstruction of his life and his country.
Under_Become_a_volunteer: Would you like to make some help? Become a volunteer and change the world better!
under_get_help: Do you need support? We will help. Leave an application right now.
under_donate_ZSU: Your support provides the AFU necessary for the liberation of our lands.
under_register: Create an account and choose your role: "Victim" or "Volunteer".
under_help_is_nearby: Create an ad or get help.
under_get_in_touch_and_help: Communicate with other users via chat or video call and organize help.
under_leave_a_review: Share your experience and help other users make the right choice.
why_us_1: Checked volunteers: We check every volunteer to ensure your safety and trust.
why_us_2: Quick help search: Convenient filters and an intuitive interface will help you quickly find the help you need.
why_us_3: Transparency and reporting: We openly report on all funds raised and assistance provided.
why_us_4: Convenient communication: Communicate with volunteers and other users through convenient chat and video communication.
why_us_5: 24/7 Support: Our team is always ready to help you with any questions.
